lines: The past 6 months have been the best of my life.
I’m so grateful for everyday I get to spend with you.
You are truly the best in every way, I never thought I’d meet anyone like you, ever.
I’ll love you forever and ever.
I keep loving you more and more everyday, every hour, minute, and second.
Seeing your smile when I wake up or after work is always the best part of my day.
You’re so thoughtful, funny, hardworking, and kind.
I don’t know what I would do without you.
I never want to be without you.
I want to be with you for the rest of my life and share every moment with you.
(I cant wait to ask you officially when the time is right hehe)
